amendment.description: To provide for the conveyance of land at March Air Force Base, California.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3243 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3243 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S6057; text: CR S6057) To provide for the conveyance of land at March Air Force Base, California.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3243 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3243 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
